About Us

Mission, values, and company profile of TECMAH Inc.

About TECMAH

Blending product leadership and generative AI execution

Led by Yoshinori Matsuura (Representative Director & CEO), TECMAH Inc. partners with teams to ship meaningful outcomes. We unite strategy, product management, and engineering to deliver measurable value fast.

Mission

Empower data-driven decisions and sustainable growth through AI and product leadership.

We work shoulder-to-shoulder with teams from vision to rollout, enabling long-term capability.

Values

  • Results First: Technology is a vehicle. Business impact is the destination.
  • Data-Driven: Decisions are informed by evidence and continuous learning.
  • Agile & Adaptive: Experiment, iterate, and respond quickly to change.
  • Partnership: We integrate with your team and transfer knowledge as we go.

Team Profile

  • Generative AI Architects: Azure OpenAI, RAG, and MLOps specialists
  • Product Leaders: Strategy, roadmaps, agile delivery, stakeholder alignment
  • Data Specialists: Analytics platforms, dashboards, and operations
  • Consultants: Market validation, business planning, change management

Selected Highlights

  • Education SaaS: +18% retention, faster AI go/no-go decisions
  • Manufacturing analytics: 50% faster anomaly response, standardized reporting
  • Retail experience: PoC to pilot in 3 months with scalable architecture
  • Startup incubation: Investment-grade insights & continuous improvement loops

Company Details

Founded 2025
